featured.text: 22 other possible transmission routes, researchers at Virginia Tech observed water drops on the leaves of wheat plants that were infected with leaf rust.
It comes from direct human contact with birds infected with the virus.
An eye stye is a small bump, resembling a pimple, that develops when an oil gland at the edge of an eyelid becomes infected by bacteria.

definition.en_def: To cause a disease or illness to be transmitted to someone or something.
definition.example: The doctor warned that the virus could easily infect anyone who was not vaccinated.
